name: THE TERROR LIES WITHIN
description:
The very first game I ever made in Unity, almost two years ago now (as of publishing this in December, 2021). Still has a special place in my heart. 

Try and survive after a shipwreck, a very short atmospheric experience. 

song used: Northwest Passage (Stan Rogers cover) by Unleash The Archers 

CONTROLS:

WASD  - move

1 - equip lantern (press F to toggle light on/off)

2 - equip gun (hold right click to cock the hammer + left click to fire)

E - interact
